name: Braun Interface by QUIET
description:
Haptic Braun interfaces are  a design classic. We saw a lot of design braun studies on behance and built a simple skeuomorphic interface in Figma.
––––
The best User Experience is like the perfect silence.  You enjoy it without even noticing, but you miss it when its not there. We are QUIET. A design studio for UX & UI located in Germany. 

https://www.bequiet.io/
